overview: A busjacking incident occurred on a route bus. The culprit took the passengers hostage and besieged them. Kizaki, a negotiator from the Special Criminal Investigation Division, rushes there. He tries to persuade the culprit to solve the case, but the escaped prisoner who is wanted and the man who killed his wife and cheating partner happened to be on board among the hostages, and the case was not resolved. It's going to be extremely difficult...
title: Female Negotiator Gets Raped 5
